    Sajjala, Sreekar Reddy

    CAE Engineer

    About
    Hello! I am Sreekar, a Computational Mechanical Engineer with thorough hands-on experience in several stratums of modelling, development, and manufacturing of machine elements.
    - I have strong theoretical knowledge in structural, fluid and thermo-dynamics.
    - I am experienced backend developer for FEM/ CFD solvers using open-source software.
    - I focuse to grow insight into Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligent models (CNN, ResNet, etc.) using TensorFlow 2.0, Keras, and Sci-kit learn. More
